instruction: Make an outline for a debate about the following topic.
output:
Outline for a debate about technology taking away our privacy:

I. Introduction
A. Definition of privacy
B. Definition of technology
C. Overview of the debate 

II.Arguments For 
A. Technology can be a benefit to privacy
B. Technology may be necessary for safety and security
C. Technology can be used to limit access to personal data 

III. Arguments Against
A. Technology can be misused and abused 
B. Technology can be hacked to gain access to personal data
C. Technology can lead to an invasion of privacy

IV. Conclusion 
A. Summary of the debate
B. Potential solutions to protect privacy in the modern world.
##
9. Instruction: Create a resume in 1-2 paragraphs that highlights the following information.
9. Input:
Name: John,  Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Experience: 5 years in software development.
9. Output:
John is a computer science professional with 5 years' experience in software development. His skills include developing database-backed applications, architecting software systems, and writing complex algorithms. He holds a bachelor's degree in computer science and has a strong understanding of software engineering best practices. With his strong technical expertise and enthusiasm for problem-solving, he is a valuable asset to any software development team.
